entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 26 April 2016
